newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Shares in Boskalis give up some gains.
newsitem.headline: Shares in Boskalis give up some gains.

text.p: Shares in Boskalis gave up part of their earlier gains in mid-afternoon, lingering at 29.00 guilders. The stock was still up 0.60 guilders from Thursday's close.

Earlier today the shares rose to 30.00 guilders, up 1.60 guilders, after the Amsterdam Stock Exchange's newsfeed issued a results summary which caused confusion among market players about Boskalis' forecast.
The company's press statement released in full later showed that its expectations of improved profits and turnover only applied to the second half of 1996 compared to the first half of 1996.
Whether 1995 results levels could be maintained in the full-year 1996 remained uncertain, Boskalis said.
Boskalis saw profits in the first six months fall to 27.5 million guilders versus 41.4 million guilders in the same period of 1995. Full year 1995 net profit was 70.9 million guilders.
